product_name: REI Frostland Microfleece Jacket - Toddler Girls'
long_description: When it's cool, toddlers will stay cozy in the REI Frostland microfleece jacket, or you can layer it under a shell jacket to give them extra warmth on cold days of outdoor fun.
short_description: When it's cool, toddlers will stay cozy in the REI Frostland microfleece jacket, or you can layer it under a shell jacket to give them extra warmth on cold days of outdoor fun.
